DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy BOTOX® treatment adult post-stroke low limb spasticity .
DOC.brief_title: BOTOX® Treatment Adult Patients With Post-Stroke Lower Limb Spasticity
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis poststroke low limb spasticity least 3 month Minimum body weight 50 kg Never treat botulinum toxin serotype reason , previously treat botulinum toxin serotype , previously treat spasticity affect low limb , must administer 20 week Day 1 , previously treat indication must administer ≥12 week prior Day 1 Spasticity opposite leg require treatment Casting study limb within 6 month plan cast first 12 week study Treatment modality study limb include ultrasound , electrical nerve stimulation , electrical stimulation , acupuncture within 1 month Day 1 treatment plan study Not able perform 10 meter walk test independently without assistive device Diagnosis myasthenia gravis , EatonLambert syndrome , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
